title: Another Crazy Fan, Rappers On The Road, Embiid & AD Injuries
description:
Brian Windhorst, Marc Spears and Ohm Youngmisuk discuss the latest fan interference episode in Washington and around the league, meeting famous rappers on the road, Joel Embiid’s injury, the LA Clippers show signs of life and tie the series 2-2, can LeBron will the Lakers to victory without Anthony Davis and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: The Hoop Collective: Another Crazy Fan, Rappers On The Road, Embiid & AD Injuries
